name: My Girlfriend From Another Dimension
description:
this is a short & sweet game about two girlfriends, Ginger the shiba inu, and Starlene the rabbit, who go on a little adventure! they live together and love each other lots.

this is a fairly short game, and you can beat it in about 10 minutes.

note: i made this game in gamemaker 8, and occaisonally it'll run slowly. running as administrator or rebooting seems to work.

CONTROLS

  • Arrow keys - move
  • Z - interact, scroll text
  • Esc - quit
